title: Color Bar HH/LL
content:
This indicator colors candles whose level range has moved up or down. If the low of the candle becomes lower than the previous one, and the high becomes higher than the previous candle, then the average color is selected.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Color

NameDescription
Average Specifies the color for this element.
Highest Specifies the color for this element.
Lowest Specifies the color for this element.
